title: When is the  Sony F3 video camera coming out? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you're referring to the NEX-F3, which is a mirrorless point-and-shoot camera that shoots video, that came out in June of this year. http://www.cameraegg.com/sony-nex-f3-release-date-specs-price-where-to-buy/ If you're referring to the PMW-F3, I'm not sure exactly when it was released, but it is available: http://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/848144-REG/Sony_PMW_F3L_RGB_PMW_F3L_Super_35mm_Full_HD.html
